scripts.dev: bun --cwd web dev & bun --cwd server dev && fg
scripts.dev-https: bun --cwd web dev-https & bun --cwd server dev && fg
scripts.branch: git checkout main && git pull && git branch -D $(whoami) ; git checkout -b $(whoami)
scripts.pages: rm -r ./docs && mkdir docs && git restore docs/CNAME && ENV=production bun pages-compile
scripts.pages-compile: cp -r web/res/* docs/ && bun build web/src/index.tsx --outdir docs --minify
scripts.ship: bun pages && git add . && git commit -m 'ship' && git push
